long_description: Svelte and simple, the Victorinox Pocket Pal Swiss Army Knife offers sensible, no-frills quality and performance for a wide range of cutting tasks, whether you're in your garage or in the wilderness. 2 folding stainless-steel blades, 1 large and 1 small, are contained in a tough plastic handle.
short_description: Svelte and simple, the Victorinox Pocket Pal Swiss Army Knife offers sensible, no-frills quality and performance for a wide range of cutting tasks, whether you're in your garage or in the wilderness.
